thread.section_title: DriveTime Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DriveTime | www.drivetime.com | 4 of 448
thread.title: Cheryl Thomas

author: Cheryl Thomas
title: Cheryl Thomas
text:
My salesman was Christopher Bridges as we walked in the door he smiled and asked how can he help me. I told him what we needed and he put the plan in motion. The sale was great no pressure or stress from him at all. I think he is a great people person.
The sales manager got us approve in a half an hour. Our sale manager was Jason Pearson. I recommend everyone I know and that will read this shop here they know how to take care of you.
Cheryl T
